hero.heading: Eletronics Repair In Ożarów Maz.
hero.description: Get your phone repaired quickly and professionally.

services.title: Our Services
services.smartphoneDescription: Broken screens, battery replacement, charging issues, microphone, and speaker repairs.
services.computerDescription: Hardware upgrades, screen repair, keyboard replacement, and data recovery.
services.consoleDescription: Overheating issues, disk drive repair, controller connection issues, and more.
services.tvDescription: Screen issues, sound problems, power supply repair, and connectivity issues.
services.cameraDescription: Lens cleaning, sensor issues, battery replacement, and button repairs.
services.otherDescription: We also fix drones, smartwatches, and any other electronic devices.
